long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Not Just Another Article Saver - Save What You See!
Are you tired of losing access to valuable content when your subscriptions expire? Meet ReadAway, the ultimate solution for saving articles exactly as you see them. With our extension, you can capture full articles, including premium content, with just one click!

Key Features:
One Click Save: Save entire articles effortlessly while you read them, ensuring you get every detail.
Capture Full Content: Unlike other services that fetch limited content, our extension saves exactly what you see, including subscription-only content.
Stay Organized: Keep all your saved articles in one convenient place, easily accessible whenever you need them.
Customizable Reading Environment: Tailor your reading experience with options to change the theme, choose your preferred font, and adjust text size for optimal comfort.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for a seamless saving experience.

How It Works:
Install the Extension: Add ReadAway to your Chrome browser.
Start Reading: Browse and read articles as usual.
Save with One Click: Click on the ReadAway icon to save the entire article instantly.

Whether you're a casual reader, a researcher, or just someone who loves to stay informed, ReadAway is the perfect tool to ensure you never miss out on important content. Download now and experience the convenience of saving what you see!
